item.title: My Boston (USA) Trip
item.description: Last week I had the privileged to travel and visit Boston, USA. It’s old but a great & lovely city. Food are bit cheaper than NZ, oops! I was looking for great coffee but sad to say I didn’t find a good one, sorry, NZ’s coffee still the best - even the petrol station near at my place was way better. On the bright side, in Boston, food was epic! here are a few food places I went to:
